meta.title: Transparent Pricing - Three Flexible Models | Humble Rentals
meta.description: Choose the approach that matches your operational capacity and budget structure. Pay per use, advance purchase, or monthly fixed pricing.

hero.title: Three Flexible Models for Municipal Programs
hero.description: Choose the approach that matches your operational capacity and budget structure.

scenarios.recommended: Option B for predictable costs and weekly service

scenarios.optionA: Pre-purchase at discount if planning multiple events
scenarios.recommended: Option A if you have multiple events per year

scenarios.standard: Pay as used for sporadic needs
scenarios.recommended: Standard for sporadic needs, Option B for daily use

items.title: No Hidden Fees
items.description: All models include delivery, setup, pickup, maintenance, charging, and 24/7 support. What you see is what you pay.

items.title: Choose Your Model
items.description: Select the pricing structure that matches your budget and operational needs, from pay-per-use to fixed monthly rates.

items.title: Scale As You Grow
items.description: Start with one model and switch as your program matures. We work with your evolving needs and budget cycles.

items.title: Full Service Logistics
items.description: Delivery, setup, placement, and pickup handled by our team. Zero operational burden on your staff.

items.title: Complete Maintenance
items.description: All battery charging, testing, and maintenance performed at our facility between deployments.

items.title: 24/7 Event Support
items.description: Real-time monitoring during events with emergency response and backup units if needed.

items.title: Usage Tracking
items.description: Detailed reporting on kWh delivered, emissions avoided, and utilization for grant compliance and planning.
